text: you aren't getting a background because in viewWillAppear you are alloc-initing a new NSClipView (default white BG) and assigning that new view to be the content view of the scroll view.
Also, I think you are using NSScrollView wrong...  I'll play with it some today and report back what I find
I've shared the images that OMSI has selected with <@U026E0ZNR> . I've also created a document with their license usage needs. Looks like all of them require attribution.
I'll share that document with the project team.
